Class KaiserActions

java.lang.Object
de.aikiit.game.kaiser.KaiserActions
public class KaiserActions extends Object
This class contains all available actions that have to be taken by the player of the game. At the moment this is done via the operating system's console.

    cultivate(KaiserEngine engine)

    static void

    Perform a feeding operation in the current game, that means give food to the population.

    • buy

      public static boolean buy(KaiserEngine engine)
      Try to buy land in the current game.
      Parameters:
      engine - the current game engine
      Returns:
      true if the buy action succeeded, false otherwise.
